column2: Project Role : IT Supplier Management Practitioner Project Role Description : Work with key IT suppliers (either for Accenture internally or for clients) by assisting on supplier selection, management and related procurement for a limited number of strategic suppliers. Also responsible for assisting in architecting, selling and delivering IT Spend Management (IT Business Management) services to clients, including proposal creation, service delivery cost estimating, due diligence, negotiating and contracting with suppliers, client presentations, and client service delivery.  Must have skills : Network Infrastructures Good to have skills : Oracle RAC/RMAN/OBIEE/Clustering/Replication Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : BTech Summary :As an IT Supplier Management Practitioner, you will be responsible for assisting in architecting, selling, and delivering IT Spend Management services to clients. Your typical day will involve working with key IT suppliers, assisting in supplier selection and management, and related procurement for a limited number of strategic suppliers.  Roles & Responsibilities: Assist in architecting, selling, and delivering IT Spend Management services to clients, including proposal creation, service delivery cost estimating, due diligence, negotiating and contracting with suppliers, client presentations, and client service delivery. Assist in supplier selection and management, and related procurement for a limited number of strategic suppliers. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including clients and suppliers, to ensure successful delivery of IT Spend Management services. Stay updated with the latest advancements in IT Spend Management and related technologies, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong knowledge of Network Infrastructures. Good To Have Skills:Experience in IT Spend Management, IT Supplier Management, and related procurement. Strong understanding of IT Spend Management and related technologies. Experience in negotiating and contracting with suppliers. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 12 years of experience in Network Infrastructures. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in technology and information architectures, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful IT Spend Management solutions. This position is based at our Pune office. Qualification BTech

column2: Bulk MRO Industrial Supply Pvt Ltd is looking for Procurement Trainee ( Interns ) to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Learning: Interns are there to learn and gain hands-on experience in a particular field or industry      They may assist with various tasks and projects, shadow experienced professionals, and participate in training sessions      Project Work: Interns often work on specific projects or tasks that align with their educational background and career interests      These projects can vary widely depending on the company and the internship's focus      Supervision: Interns typically report to a supervisor or mentor who provides guidance, sets expectations, and evaluates their performance      Networking: Internships provide opportunities for networking and building relationships within the industry, which can be valuable for future career opportunities      Skill Development: Interns can develop and enhance their skills, including technical, communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills
